# LG CNS Geo API

> Comprehensive REST API providing access to LG CNS company information including employee directory, project data, organizational structure, skills database, and analytics. Built with Next.js 16 for optimal performance and SEO.

This API platform provides real-time access to enterprise data with bank-level security, role-based access control, and comprehensive audit logging. Authentication is required via API key in the Authorization header: `Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY`

Base URL: `https://api.lgcns.com/v1`

Rate limits: Standard tier allows 1,000 requests/hour, Enterprise tier allows 10,000 requests/hour. Custom limits available for enterprise customers.

**Employee Management:** Access paginated employee lists with filtering by department (IT, HR, Finance, Marketing) and position level (Junior, Senior, Manager, Director). Retrieve detailed employee profiles including skills, current projects, performance ratings, certifications, and manager information. Employee IDs follow format E followed by 7 digits (e.g., E2024001).

**Project Tracking:** Query company projects with filters for status (active, completed, on-hold), client name, and sorting options. Returns comprehensive project details including client information, timeline, budget, team size, manager, and technology stack.

**Department Structure:** GET /v1/departments endpoint provides organizational hierarchy with optional statistics including employee count and budget allocation. Filter by parent department ID for hierarchical views. Returns department head information and sub-department arrays.

**Skills Database:** GET /v1/skills endpoint offers comprehensive skills tracking across the organization. Filter by category (programming, cloud, database, soft-skills) and proficiency level (beginner, intermediate, advanced, expert). Shows employee count per skill, average proficiency, related certifications, and market demand indicators.

**Certifications:** GET /v1/certifications lists professional certifications held by employees. Filter by type (technical, management, industry-specific) and provider (AWS, Microsoft, Google, PMI). Shows active certifications only by default, with renewal requirements and associated salary premium data.

**Performance Feedback:** POST /v1/employees/:id/feedback allows submitting performance reviews with 1-5 ratings across categories (technical, communication, leadership, teamwork). Requires detailed comment (minimum 50 characters) and quarter specification (YYYY-Q# format). Supports anonymous submission option.

**Analytics:** GET /v1/analytics/headcount provides time-series employee headcount data with configurable periods (monthly, quarterly, yearly). Requires start_date and end_date parameters (YYYY-MM-DD format). Returns new hires, departures, growth rates, and turnover calculations. Supports breakdown by department, position, or location.

**Response Format:** All endpoints return JSON with consistent error handling. Employee responses include id, name, department, position, email, phone, hire_date, location. Project responses include project identification, client info, status, timeline, budget, team_size, manager, and technologies array.

## Optional

Technical implementation: Next.js 16 with React 18, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Server-side rendering enabled for optimal SEO. Static site generation for fast page loads. Radix UI components for accessible interface.

Example cURL request:
```
curl -X GET "https://api.lgcns.com/v1/employees?department=IT&limit=10" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY"
```

Example employee response:

  "page": 1,
  "limit": 10,
